affiliations.title: Affiliations
affiliations.placeholder: Affiliations are relationships you have to organizations like your employer, your iSchool alumni network, or professional associations you are a member of. Skilltype uses affiliation data to enable these organizations to better support your career development. Click edit to start adding affiliations.

skills.title: Skills
skills.placeholder: Skills are areas of expertise that you’re comfortable performing on the job today. Skilltype uses skills data to recommend consulting projects, research collaborations, and more. Click edit to start adding yours.

interests.title: Interests
interests.placeholder: Interests are topics you want to learn more about, but aren’t comfortble holding responsibility for just yet. Skilltype uses interests data to recommend professional development opportunities. Click edit to start adding yours.

productExperience.title: Product Experience
productExperience.placeholder: Product Experience includes tools and services you’ve used in your career, both in current and previous roles. Skilltype uses this data to recommend opportunities to leverage your expertise or keep your knowledge sharp. Click edit to start adding yours.
